name: Game Boy Camera Gallery: Mystery Show (early access demo)
name_original: Game Boy Camera Gallery: Mystery Show (early access demo)
description:
Purchasing the game will grant you early access to beta builds of the game as well as the finished game weeks before it is released! The game will be free-to-play when launched, so you are simply paying for early access. You'll also receive a $3 coupon toward physical cartridges in my shop when they go live for preorders.

Timeline

Partial builds: starting June, 2023
Beta Builds: starting August, 2023
Cartridge Preorders: September, 2023
Digital Release: Mid/Late October, 2023

Update 3-31-23: The first rom file is available for download, featuring just the intro sequence and one playable scene, as well as one demo for the first song of the soundtrack by Sloopygoop.
